subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gallinari is still bothered by a bulging disk and is unable to show off the dazzling play that prompted the Knicks to make him the sixth pick over all in the N.B.A. draft.
snippet: Gallinari is still bothered by a bulging disk and is unable to show off the dazzling play that prompted the Knicks to make him the sixth pick over all in the N.B.A. draft.
